casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Joseph WALKER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 10, 2018 Katherine C. Essington, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 345 , 175 A.3d 576 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
